bio: Hailing from the state of Andhra Pradesh, Harishankar Reddy is a fast bowler who made his T20 debut in the 2017-18 Zonal T20 League. The promising young pacer was acquired by Chennai for his base price in the 2021 Indian T20 League auctions. During the Chennai preparation camp ahead of the season, Reddy's video where he bowled MS Dhoni was a hit on social media.
